description.value:
You can magically apply your toxic essence onto your weapon or onto the weapon of a willing ally within 30 feet as a standard action. (Poison—injury; save Fort DC 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str, Dex, or Con damage [chosen when this ability is used]; cure 1 save).

You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

At 5th level, the ability damage of your poison increases to 1d3.

At 7th level, each time you apply your progenitor’s sting, you can choose two ability scores for your bloodline poison to affect.

At 11th level, whenever you apply your progenitor’s sting to a weapon, you can magically apply it onto all willing allies’ weapons within 20 feet as well. This counts as one use of your bloodline ability.
